name: REGIONAL AVIATION COLLEGE
about: At Regional Aviation College, we offer a comprehensive and accredited flight training program designed to prepare students for successful careers in aviation. Our curriculum includes FAA ground and flight training, aviation safety, aircraft systems, aerodynamics, and meteorology. Students fly in modern, well-maintained aircraft, such as Cessna 172s and Diamond DA-20s, and utilize advanced flight simulators to enhance their training. With a strong focus on safety, professionalism, and ethical leadership, our program equips graduates with the necessary certifications, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive top-notch training, preparing them for roles as airline pilots, commercial pilots, or flight instructors. We are committed to developing highly skilled and safety-oriented pilots who will excel in the aviation industry.
services:
["Air Cargo Operations
Airport Operations
Flight Dispatch/Operations
Aircraft Maintenance Engineering"]
